title: Chintz Fragments, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation; mordants for reds, purples, black and browns applied by pen and brush (sometimes over resist); blue applied over resist; yellow applied over blue (chintz)
description: Four fragments of a larger design of exotic blossoms, tree trunks, and birds on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragments, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation; mordants for reds, purples, black and browns applied by pen and brush (sometimes over resist); blue applied over resist; yellow applied over blue (chintz). Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-1-a/d.
